file_insights.primary_purpose: Comprehensive customization guide for TikTok content templates
file_insights.content_depth: Very comprehensive - includes step-by-step workflows, multiple examples across product categories, decision matrices, and advanced strategies

patterns_discovered.description: Guide uses a three-layer customization model: Psychological Framework (immutable), Strategic Placeholders (customizable), and Brand Voice (adaptable)
patterns_discovered.significance: Provides clear mental model for what to change vs. preserve

patterns_discovered.description: Each concept moves from generic template → variables identified → filled with specifics → voice-adapted → final version
patterns_discovered.frequency: Applied to hooks, scripts, and framework examples

patterns_discovered.description: Same template framework applied to diverse products (trading card binder, gaming headset, kitchen organizer) showing universal adaptability
patterns_discovered.significance: Demonstrates template flexibility and reduces perceived complexity

patterns_discovered.description: Customization varies based on audience knowledge level (beginners, experts, budget-conscious), not just product type
patterns_discovered.frequency: Featured in script customization and pain point ladder strategy
patterns_discovered.significance: Addresses how same template serves different market segments

patterns_discovered.description: Uses checkboxes and decision matrices to make abstract concepts concrete and actionable
patterns_discovered.frequency: Distributed throughout: product info checklist, voice audit, decision matrix
patterns_discovered.significance: Increases usability by converting guidance into executable tasks

gotchas_discovered.description: Users might over-customize and destroy the psychological framework that makes templates work. Guide addresses this by explicitly stating what NOT to change.
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Clear layer 1 designation and repeated warnings about preserving core structure

gotchas_discovered.description: Simply replacing template variables without incorporating customer language results in still-generic content
gotchas_discovered.impact: Medium - content performs adequately but misses resonance
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Emphasis on customer language audit and before/after examples showing the difference

gotchas_discovered.description: Customizations might technically fit the template but sound inauthentic to brand personality
gotchas_discovered.impact: Medium - content underperforms despite correct structure
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Brand voice audit section with decision matrix and multiple voice adaptation examples

gotchas_discovered.description: Users may list technical features without translating them to customer-relevant benefits
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Feature Translation Framework strategy with explicit [Feature] → [Benefit] → [Outcome] structure

approach_outcome.methodology: Educational document creation with practical workflow structure
key_achievements: Created 2 advanced strategy frameworks (Pain Point Ladder, Feature Translation)
Included 5+ decision matrices and structured checklists
approach_outcome.deliverable_quality: Production-ready comprehensive guide with high pedagogical value
approach_outcome.technical_execution: Clean markdown structure with clear hierarchy, tables, code blocks, and visual organization

recommendations.recommendation: Create companion video walkthrough showing real-time customization of a template from start to finish
recommendations.rationale: Guide is text-heavy; visual demonstration would improve accessibility for different learning styles

recommendations.recommendation: Add inline links/references connecting to specific template files mentioned in goal-first selection table
recommendations.rationale: Users need easy navigation from guide to actual templates to reduce friction in workflow

recommendations.recommendation: Include template customization checklist at end that users can save/share to track their customization process
recommendations.rationale: Would increase actionability and provide usage data on which customization steps users find challenging

recommendations.recommendation: Expand 'Common Customization Mistakes' section with failure case studies showing what went wrong and how to fix it
recommendations.rationale: Learning from mistakes is often more impactful than positive examples alone; would add practical diagnostic value

recommendations.recommendation: Create template-specific customization micro-guides that reference this master guide rather than duplicating sections
recommendations.rationale: Would reduce maintenance burden and ensure consistency across all template documentation
